channel.title: ZenScape looking for staff!
channel.description:
[center][font=Verdana][u][b]ZENSCAPE[/b][/u][/font][/center]
ZenScape , a new runescape private server is looking for staff. And no it wont be a PkOnly server ok?
What you can expect at the end: -All skills working ( yes, all of them) - Tons of monster spawns, all over the world... /npcs - Lots of quests - A lot of new things added
Up To Date:
[u]Combat[/u]: - Range working with full arrows!- Magics 100% now working on ancients!- All potions work! 4 doses!
[u]Skills[/u]: -Mining working 100%-smithing 100%-Firemaking 100%-Herblore 95% - Fishing! 100%!- Cooking!! In range Next you can cook in fire too!- Oh! FULL Fletching 100%
[u]Misc[/u]. -NPC Dialogues/talking!!-Quests!
Much more! You can request more things to be included!
OK now for the staff aplicants:
[b]SERVER OWNER/ MAIN CODER:[/b]
-Zenadix
[b]SERVER HOSTER[/b]
-EMPTY!
The hoster will have full rights, will be a lvl3- PlayerRights Admin inGame and superadmin in forums. You need to have a good connection speed so it wont lag and be able to keep your computer on for 12+ hours per day. Apply here!
Client coder:
-EMPTY
This will be the person who will make a webclent for the server and IDK. You need to have experience in this.
[b]GEN SERVER CODERS/TESTERS[/b]
-Ch1N0 -EMPTY!
Your job will be to enter the game in search for bugs all over ZenScape. Also can code some thingys. You should know some Java code
That's all. If any of you have experience with forums even better. Start applying!

item.title: ZenScape looking for staff!
item.dc:creator: @Zenadix Zenadix
item.description:
@Zenadix wrote:

[center][font=Verdana]ZENSCAPE[/font][/center]

ZenScape , a new runescape private server is looking for staff. And no it wont be a PkOnly server ok?

What you can expect at the end:
-All skills working ( yes, all of them)

  • Tons of monster spawns, all over the world… /npcs
  • Lots of quests
  • A lot of new things added

Up To Date:

Combat:

  • Range working with full arrows!- Magics 100% now working on ancients!- All potions work! 4 doses!

Skills:
-Mining working 100%-smithing 100%-Firemaking 100%-Herblore 95% - Fishing! 100%!- Cooking!! In range Next you can cook in fire too!- Oh! FULL Fletching 100%

Misc.
-NPC Dialogues/talking!!-Quests!

Much more! You can request more things to be included!

OK now for the staff aplicants:

SERVER OWNER/ MAIN CODER:

-Zenadix

SERVER HOSTER

-EMPTY!

The hoster will have full rights, will be a lvl3- PlayerRights Admin inGame and superadmin in forums.
You need to have a good connection speed so it wont lag and be able to keep your computer on for 12+ hours per day.
Apply here!

Client coder:

-EMPTY

This will be the person who will make a webclent for the server and IDK. You need to have experience in this.

GEN SERVER CODERS/TESTERS

-Ch1N0
-EMPTY!

Your job will be to enter the game in search for bugs all over ZenScape. Also can code some thingys. You should know some Java code

That’s all. If any of you have experience with forums even better. Start applying!
